FORGOTPASSWORD.TITLE: Recover your password
FORGOTPASSWORD.DESCRIPTION: Please provide the email address that you used when you signed up for your crCasas account. We will send you an email that will allow you to reset your password
FORGOTPASSWORD.SUCCESS: An email with password reset instructions has been sent to your email address, if it exists on our system.
FORGOTPASSWORD.FAILURE: Sucedió algo inesperado. Por favor intente más tarde o solicite ayuda a admin@crcasas.com

ERRORS.EMAIL_MUST_VALID: Email must be a valid e-mail address
